StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruiterByIRTCardID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@cardID uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT TOP (1) RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE) AS RankCode, RTRIM(p.LAST_NAME) AS LastName, RTRIM(p.FIRST_NAME) AS FirstName, RTRIM(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME) AS MiddleName, rp.rowguid AS RecruiterID FROM MCRISS.dbo.PERSON AS p INNER JOIN vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson AS rp ON p.PERSON_ID = rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID INNER JOIN IRTCard AS irt ON rp.rowguid = irt.RecruiterID
WHERE irt.IRTCardId = @cardID
END
